house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1988 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Intercom System,Kitchen Island, Microwave, Wet Bar
